roleset.name: confirm truth of a statement

example.name: typical
example.text: Three pieces of evidence corroborate the key assumption that Democratic legislators are more willing to engage in local benefit-seeking than their Republican colleagues.
example.arg: the key assumption that Democratic legislators are more willing to engage in local benefit-seeking than their Republican colleagues

roleset.note: Based on sentences in wsj. Member of VNcls indicate-78, transfer_mesg-37.1.1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.
